::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit. "Get in. That's an order, no arguing on 
this."  She ran over to GoldenEye, "You take Dollen, if you can carry 
him."  She ran over to the front of the ship and looked for Phobia.
"PHOBIA, WE NEED TO GET OUT OF HERE! Do you have an escape pod that 
the others can use?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream went to Jet Mode and hovered towards Drillbit and KitKat
> 
> "Come on! I can only take one of you so someone get in my 
> cockpit!"(Hate to say it, but that sounds dirtier than it is.)
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix
> 
> Brix looked at the damaged hull, and than at Fliq.
> 
> "We've got to do something, or he's done for. The only thing we can 
> do is use the pieces of hull we took off and....Wait! I've got an 
> even better idea! Ramulus, can you shout down the liftoff count? 
This 
> thing is gonna go in a few minutes, and when it does we'll be stuck 
> and liq will burn up in the atmosphere."
> 
> Brix headed over to Gekkidama's dead body and picked it up He 
pressed 
> a few buttons on his arm, and his back plate popped off.
> 
> "Portable shield....Don't know why he didn't use it."
> 
> Br5ix shoved the shield into the hole.
> 
> "This shield was designed to take huge beatings. I think it will 
hold 
> the re-entry. Shut down the countdown, I 've got to go somewhere 
for 
> a sec. Even though Gekkidama tried to kill, he was really insane 
from 
> lac of contact. He still desrves a proper burial(In the show, did 
> Dinobt have a burial, or did they just blast him into space?). I'll 
> go cover him in some of the ship wreck."
> 
> Brix picked up the body and walked away.
